sentences.sentence: This resulted in a considerable loss to the exchequer.
sentences.translation: 这使国库遭受了重大损失。

sentences.sentence: In order to "change lives for the better" and reduce "dependency", George Osborne, Chancellor of the Exchequer, introduced the "upfront work search" scheme.
sentences.translation: 为了“改善生活”和减少“依赖”，英国财政大臣乔治·奥斯本推出了“前期工作搜索”计划。

sentences.sentence: The Chancellor of the Exchequer has indicated that he plans to revive a scheme put forward last year by the International Monetary Fund, which has not yet provided any relief.
sentences.translation: 这位英国财政大臣表示，他计划重启国际货币基金组织去年提出的一项计划，该计划迄今尚未提供任何帮助。
